summary.span: 表示当控件从一个状态转换到另一个状态时发生的可视行为。

span.span: Represents the visual behavior that occurs when a control transitions from one state to another.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过添加对象在状态之间转换时，可以指定控件的可视行为 。You can specify the visual behavior of a control when it transitions between states by adding objects. 当你创建时 ，你可以指定以下一个或多个：When you create a , you specify one or more of the following: - 通过设置属性，在状态之间进行转换所花费的时间 。The time it takes for a transition between states to occur by setting the property. - 在转换时，通过设置属性来对控件外观进行的其他更改 。Additional changes in the control's appearance that occur at the time of the transition by setting the property. - 当 通过设置和属性来应用 时 。When the is applied by setting the and properties. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，它指定当用户将鼠标移出控件时，控件的边框将更改为蓝色，然后更改为黄色，然后在1.5 秒内更改为黑色。The following example creates a that specifies that when the user moves the mouse away from the control, the control's border changes to blue, then to yellow, and then to black in 1.5 seconds. 有关完整示例，请参阅 [通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control)。For the entire example, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control). [!code-xaml[VSMButtonTemplate#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmbuttontemplate/csharp/skinnedbutton.xaml#8)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要从其过渡的 的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the to transition from.

value.span: 要从其过渡的 的名称。

span.span: The name of the to transition from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性为可选。The property is optional. 可以限制为仅适用于特定状态，或者可以在控件在状态之间转换时应用。A can be restricted to apply to only certain states or it can be applied any time the control transitions between states. 通过设置和属性来限制应用的时间 。You restrict when a is applied by setting the and properties. 下表描述了从最严限制到最宽松限制的限制级别。The following table describes the levels of restriction from most restrictive to least restrictive. |限制类型Type of restriction|起始值Value of From|目标值Value of To| |-------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |从一个指定状态到另一个指定状态From a specified state to another specified state|的名称 The name of a |的名称 The name of a | |从任意状态到指定状态From any state to a specified state|未设置Not set|的名称 The name of a | |从指定状态到任意状态From a specified state to any state|的名称 The name of a |未设置Not set| |从任意状态到其他任意状态From any state to any other state|未设置Not set|未设置Not set| 中可以有多个 引用相同状态的对象，但它们将按照上表指定的顺序使用。You can have multiple objects in a that refer to the same state, but they will be used in the order that the previous table specifies. 可以通过创建一个继承自的新类 并重写方法来更改此行为 。You can change this behavior by creating a new class that inherits from and overriding the method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建两个 对象。The following example creates two objects. 当控件从 `Pressed` 状态转换到 `MouseOver` 状态时，将 使用同时具有和的 。When the control transitions from the `Pressed` state to the `MouseOver` state, the that has both and set is used. 当控件从非 `Pressed` 的状态转换为 `MouseOver` 状态时，将使用另一种状态。When the control transitions from a state that is not `Pressed` to the `MouseOver` state, the other state is used. [!code-xaml[VSMButtonTemplate#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmbuttontemplate/csharp/skinnedbutton.xaml#7)]

summary.span: 获取或设置从一个状态转为另一个状态所需的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the time that it takes to move from one state to another.

value.span: 从一个状态转为另一个状态所需的时间。

span.span: The time that it takes to move from one state to another.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过设置属性来指定转换所用的时间 。You can specify how long a transition takes by setting the property. 设置 属性时，您指定了发生转换所需要的时间。When you set the property, you are specifying the time that it takes for the transition to occur. ## Examples 下面的示例指定控件只需要半秒钟即可进入 `MouseOver` 状态。The following example specifies that the control takes one half second to go into the `MouseOver` state. 有关完整示例，请参阅 [通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control)。For the entire example, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control). [!code-xaml[VSMButtonTemplate#MouseOverTransition](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmbuttontemplate/csharp/skinnedbutton.xaml#mouseovertransition)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于在状态间转换的自定义数学公式。

span.span: Gets or sets a custom mathematical formula that is used to transition between states.

value.span: 用于在状态间转换的自定义数学公式。

span.span: A custom mathematical formula that is used to transition between states.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以设置 属性，以指定转换的发生方式。You can set the property to specify the way a transition occurs. 例如，可以指定缓动函数以加速或减速转换。For example, you can specify an easing function to accelerate or decelerate the transition. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [缓动函数](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/easing-functions)。For more information, see [Easing Functions](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/easing-functions). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ， 当用户在上按鼠标按钮时，它将导致垂直移动 。The following example creates a that causes a to move vertically when the user presses the mouse button over the . 该示例将 属性设置为一个 对象，以使在 到达其目标时出现弹跳。The example sets the property to a object to cause the to appear to bounce when it reaches its destination. 当用户释放按钮时，使用的是另一个 对象，以使在 其返回到其原始位置之前弹跳。The that is used when the user releases the button has another object to cause the to bounce before it returns to its original position. [!code-xaml[VSMCustomControl#VSMEasingFunction](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmcustomcontrol/csharp/window1.xaml#vsmeasingfunction)] 下面的示例演示了和事件的事件处理程序 。The following example shows the event handler for the and events. 该示例调用 方法以更改 画布的。The example calls the method to change the of the canvas. [!code-csharp[VSMCustomControl#VSMEasingFunctionLogic](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmcustomcontrol/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#vsmeasingfunctionlogic)] [!code-vb[VSMCustomControl#VSMEasingFunctionLogic](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmcustomcontrol/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#vsmeasingfunctionlogic)]

span.span: Gets or sets the that occurs when the transition occurs.
The that occurs when the transition occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 包含时 ，将在 应用的任何时间运行 。When a contains a , the runs any time the is applied. 例如，如果希望的边框在 用户将鼠标移开时更改颜色，可以创建一个，它 具有 更改按钮背景的。For example, if you want the border of a to change colors when the user moves the mouse away from it, you can create a that has a that changes the button's background. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，它指定当用户将鼠标移出控件时，控件的边框将更改为蓝色，然后更改为黄色，然后在1.5 秒内更改为黑色。The following example creates a that specifies that when the user moves the mouse away from the control, the control's border changes to blue, then to yellow, and then to black in 1.5 seconds. 有关完整示例，请参阅 [通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control)。For the entire example, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性为可选。The property is optional. 可以限制为仅适用于特定状态，或者可以在控件在状态之间转换时应用。A can be restricted to apply to only certain states or it can be applied any time the control transitions between states. 通过设置和属性来限制应用的时间 。You restrict when a is applied by setting the and properties. 下表描述了从最严限制到最宽松限制的限制级别。The following table describes the levels of restriction from most restrictive to least restrictive. |限制类型Type of restriction|起始值Value of From|目标值Value of To| |-------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |从一个指定状态到另一个指定状态From a specified state to another specified state|的名称 The name of a |的名称 The name of a | |从任意状态到指定状态From any state to a specified state|未设置Not set|的名称 The name of a | |从指定状态到任意状态From a specified state to any state|的名称 The name of a |未设置Not set| |从任意状态到其他任意状态From any state to any other state|未设置Not set|未设置Not set| 中可以有多个 引用相同状态的对象，但它们将按照上表指定的顺序使用。You can have multiple objects in a that refer to the same state, but they will be used in the order that the previous table specifies. 可以通过创建一个继承自的新类 并重写方法来更改此行为 。You can change this behavior by creating a new class that inherits from and overriding the method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建两个 对象。The following example creates two objects. 当控件从 `Pressed` 状态转换到 `MouseOver` 状态时，将 使用同时具有和的 。When the control transitions from the `Pressed` state to the `MouseOver` state, the that has both and set is used. 当控件从非 `Pressed` 的状态转换为 `MouseOver` 状态时，将使用另一种状态。When the control transitions from a state that is not `Pressed` to the `MouseOver` state, the other state is used.
